a tumour (= a mass of diseased cells) that is a common type of brain cancer: Testing of the drug has begun in children and adults with gliomas, a type of brain tumour. Glioma is the most common general category of brain tumour, accounting for about 42% of all cases.
More examplesFewer examplesThe scan showed a golf ball-sized glioma in the frontal lobe of her brain. The relation between consciousness level and cerebral blood flow (CBF) was analyzed in 17 cases of glioma.The main difficulty is in distinguishing cancer from healthy tissue in neural and brain cancers known as gliomas. The objective of the study was to review the role of radiosurgery in newly diagnosed malignant glioma.
